content:
Hi, I don't know how but starting from today my admin account is no longer subscribed to a private stream. The problem is that I am not able to join the private stream anymore!!!
If I try to add my admin user to the stream, a message says that only stream members can add another user to it.
If I try to enter as a stream channel member and add my admin user to it, a message says that Only administrators can modify other users' subscriptions.
It's a loop!
How can I solve it? :dizzy:
P.S.: I am self-hosted
